entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Annotating a type with a JSON converter blocks the JSON source generator crawling #82001
  • corehost build doesn't seem to be properly incremental #82000
  • SocketsHttpHandler persistent request timeouts due to .NET 6 connection pooling behavior #81989
  • Refactor EventSource/EventProvider command scheme so it is more understandable #81987

Closed

  • Volatile.Read/Write aren't atomic for Int64 on 32bit #81999
  • SemaphoreSlim Wait/WaitAsync heavy lag #53598
    Future
  • Crossgen2 asserts in JIT when compiling The JIT\Regression\JitBlue\Runtime_81739 #81963
    8.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder doesn't honor pre-existing ISet when binding #79766
    7.0.x
  • XmlSqlBinaryReader is not working in .Net6 #74852
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasi] Fix the setting of XUNIT_RANDOM_ORDER_SEED, wasmtime uses --en… #82003
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Generalize `emitRemoveLastInstruction()` #82002
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Handle some "field offset computation" patterns #81998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert to GeneratedRegexAttribute fixer should preserve references to const string fields #81997
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • #78303 Draft: Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • remove test references to archaic Linux versions #81992
    area-Meta, test-enhancement
  • Move a number of JsonPropertyInfo reflection components to DefaultJsonTypeInfoResolver #81990
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add emsdk dependencies to fix codeflow to installer #81988
    area-Infrastructure-installer

Merged

  • Add basic support for folding SIMD intrinsics #81547
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in another place in System.Text.Json #81976
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/6.0] Fix NullabilityInfoContext.Create throws IndexOutOfRangeException and other bugs #81291
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection, 6.0.15
  • [release/7.0] Unpin the C# compiler version #81247
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] Fix filtered exceptions when checking for ip forwarding #81157
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 7.0.4
  • [6.0] Fix internal coreclr debian helix queue not found #81978
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable RTTI on Unix #81986
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle renamed compressed .mibc files gracefully in crossgen2/dotnet-pgo #81955
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Transform IntCon(0) to VecCon(0) for WithElement case - fixes emitter assertion for crossgen2 #81981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add additional case where public signing cannot be used #77998
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • JIT: in minimal profiling mode, ignore impact of conditional throws #81972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2111486 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Don't instrument methods with [Intrinsic] #81983
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Enable building NativeAOT for Apple mobile platforms #81780
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adding support to mono for v128 constants #81902
  • [mono] RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan<T> is now intrinsic. #81695
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Avoid a few unnecessary char.ToStrings #81980
    area-System.IO
  • Replace some single-char strings with chars #81831
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81281
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 6.0.15
  • [release/7.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81283
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 7.0.x
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #77794
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • String.Split() trim last substring if specified #81331
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Create BitArray.HasAllSet() and .HasAnySet(). #81527
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Issue correct Enable/Disable commands for EventSources with EventPipe #81867
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix XmlSqlBinaryReader and introduce a corpus of SqlXml tests #81878
    area-System.Xml, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Parametrized macros for emitting arm64/neon opcodes #81887
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Unify type instantiations in reflection emit #81518
    area-System.Reflection
  • [android][ios] Add LibraryBuilder task to support aot library mode #81919
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Testmerging JIT/Directed #81969
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow some intrinsics in Tier0 (e.g. Enum.HasFlag) #77357
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Allow root path for Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.SpecialDirectories #81861
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • JIT: start working on profile consistency #81936
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • msi leaves old package in C:\Windows\Installer #30523
  • 🎉 Annual dotnet/sdk community survey 2023 🎉 #30518

Closed

  • dotnet restore behavior change from 6.0.404 to 6.0.405 in Linux #30522

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #30517
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30488
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #30482
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2110830 #30412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30499
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Primary Constructors #2691
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Roles and extensions #5497
    Working Set
  • `is` expression evaluating `const` expression should be considered constant #6926

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Keyword color for u8 identifier is broken in VS 17.5 Preview 3 #66507
  • Port MakeLocalFunctionStaticCodeFixProvider to CodeStyle layer #43070
    Backlog
  • Completion in a tuple isn't always treated as an expression #36472
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Logging Methods #66826
    Area-IDE
  • Move 'Use local function' down to CodeStyle layer. #66825
    Area-IDE
  • Provide unique suggestions when generating member names #66824
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Allow razor tests to get diagnostics #66748
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move fixer down to code-style layer #66780
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix case where the 'default' keyword was not recommended #66821
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Implement legacy options provider for code actions in workspace layer #66798
    Area-IDE
  • Fix parsing of 'file[]' and 'required[]' in old language versions #66769
    Area-Compilers
  • Local state tracing instrumentation #66768
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure that files added are immediately hooked up to open buffers #66550
    Area-IDE
  • Fix crash in FAR helpers when only part of a linked-document set has been updated #66805
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #46590
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #46589
  • Perf regression: plaintext #46588
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, https, mvc #46587
  • HttpContext not working in Kestrel in Visual Studio Code #46586
  • Blazor server page code-behind retrieving query string parameters #46583

Closed

  • Can't see generated OpenAPI generated Client after the Latest Update #31087
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Certain HTTP/2 requests failing with a 504 when going through an F5 BIG-IP device #46527
  • Installers are a complete mess #40781
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, https #46582
  • HostingStartup failed to execute after updating to .net 7/asp.core 7 on Azure App Service #45022
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Avoid stream ID and client result ID collisions #46591
    area-signalr, 7.0.x
  • Unify HTTP token parsing code #46580
  • Update CreateSlimBuilder to use Host.CreateEmptyApplicationBuilder. #46579
    area-web-frameworks
  • Don't clobber non-default status codes in static files middleware #46578
    area-runtime
  • Prefer TypeConverter over TryParse #46577
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • fix typo in log message #46540
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview2
  • ServerComparison.FunctionalTests: extend nginx configuration so nginx starts on RHEL and Fedora. #46507
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • Avoid stream ID and client result ID collisions #46570
    area-signalr
  • Introduce 'RenderTreeBuilder.AddComponentParameter()' #46562
    area-blazor
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Bump up the MIN_PORT for ANCM out of process #46432
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • StatusCodePagesMiddleware: Improving response started verification #46576
    area-web-frameworks
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime
  • Prevent NRE when body is not set #46564
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui Blazor Publish Issue #13279
  • Fix iOS to key loaded/unloaded off a more correct platform event #13277
    Backlog
  • The program '[4884] MyFirstMauiApp.exe' has exited with code 2147942405 (0x80070005). #13276
  • MenuFlyout cause app to break in RELEASE MODE when use it inside a ContentView #13275
  • IsEnabled property not work for MenuFlyoutItem #13274
  • [Bug]: RadioButton page crash app - RELEASE MODE #13272
  • WindowsUIView.ManipulationStarted event in Windows Maui is not correctly raised #13270
  • [Windows][Picker] Background and BackgroundColour properties are not updating #13269
  • ResourceDictionary.ContainsKey method never returns true #13268

Closed

  • (Delete this) #13278
  • .net MAUI Picker SelectedIndex does not cause item to display #13013
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Set Icon to null and back again, working around Android issue #13267
  • Removing skip attribute from color validation tests #13266
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13265
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [CI] Allow to pass the checkout dir to the packs template. #13264

Updated

  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    area/modal
  • [controls] fix memory leak in Style and AttachedCollection #13260
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Use the launcher to start the camera #13220
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Ensure OnMeasure always calls SetMeasuredDimension in ShellPageContainer #13153
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix crash on Windows WebView updating the Html Source more than once #13222
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • ItemContentControl - apply bindings once for ItemTemplate (Windows) #10999
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • List constructs EF uses that require non-public code access #29843
    8.0.0
  • EF Core 7 Unable to create a new migration using TPH inheritance with an Enum type named Discriminator #29993
    8.0.0
  • Stylecop is interfering with EfBundle creation in docker image in gitlab CI #30074
    8.0.0

Updated

  • Support of unnamed parameters in Microsoft.Data.Sqlite #24480
    Backlog
  • Comparing a property with a value converter against null throws exception in EF7 InMemory #29603
  • Non-empty second migration in TPC scheme using inheritance #30058
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7 regression: Deletion can cause error "The association between entity types A and B has been severed etc." #30122
    7.0.x
  • RevEng: Decimal column with same precision and scale as the default produce warnings at runtime #12241
    Backlog
  • Compiled models with JSON columns #29602
    8.0.0
  • Add Generic version of EntityTypeConfiguration Attribute #30072
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Store null table name in the model snapshot for TPC abstract types #30257
  • Add NativeAOT support for Change Tracking #30256
  • Support JSON columns in compiled models #30254

Merged

  • Don't set table names from DbSet properties when Discriminator property is conflicted with the default but is then configured explicitly #30234
  • Mark bundle Program.cs as auto-generated #30210

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-11
entry.content:
PullRequests

  • Add lci files to filter localization #15515
